Package org.drip.state.nonlinear

Class FlatForwardGovvieCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.discount.DiscountCurve
      • org.drip.state.govvie.GovvieCurve
        • org.drip.state.govvie.ExplicitBootGovvieCurve
          • org.drip.state.nonlinear.FlatForwardGovvieCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve, ExplicitBootCurve, DiscountFactorEstimator, YieldEstimator, LatentState
    public class FlatForwardGovvieCurve
extends ExplicitBootGovvieCurve
    FlatForwardGovvieCurve manages the Govvie Latent State, using the Flat Forward Rate as the State Response Representation.

    • Project = State
    • Package = Non Linear
    • Specification = Fixed Income Analytics Library


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
